column4: Just a question about reinstalling ubuntu: I made a separate /home, so when I reinstall, i'll still have all my documents, but will have to redo all my settings and programs right?
though /etc and /usr/share have some settings you'll have to redoo
ozzmosis,fryguy: thanks, so if i just copy my /etc/ folder i should be okay?
I hv regular backups of /home /etc and /var
